attributes.additional_details:
Our current UK government is made up of millionaires who do not need their MP/MEP salary or pensions to survive. As this government has slashed hundreds of thousands of jobs and asked people to volunteer to fill these posts instead of being paid I think it's time this government was made to lead by example.

I propose the current UK government act to ensure all MP and MEP jobs become unpaid and with no pensions with immediate effect.
